meanings.definition: A person who smuggles contraband goods.
meanings.sent1: The contrabandists were caught trying to sneak illegal items across the border.
meanings.sent2: The authorities are cracking down on contrabandists who try to bring in prohibited goods.
meanings.sent3: The contrabandists thought they could outsmart the customs officers, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: The contrabandists operated in the shadows, like modern-day pirates.
meanings.sent5: The image of the contrabandists sneaking through the night stayed with me.

meanings.definition: The act of smuggling contraband goods.
meanings.sent1: The contrabandists was a risky business that could lead to serious consequences.
meanings.sent2: Authorities are working to prevent the contrabandists of illegal items into the country.
meanings.sent3: The contrabandists of forbidden goods seemed like characters from a spy movie.
meanings.sent4: The contrabandists of illicit items operated like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The news of the contrabandists made headlines across the nation.
